s01e01: video 42m20s, audio 43m52s, 952,400,576bytes

Rifftrax released 2007.04.13

This is a remux with the Rifftrax commentary added as the default audio track. The Rifftrax audio track has been newly remastered to ensure the riff comments are just loud enough to be clear when the episode is loud and not too loud when the episode is quiet. Please leave any feedback regarding the Rifftrax audio remastering.

Note for the s01e01 Rifftrax audio track - audio1, 2.0 Riff - the Rifftrax intro comments run longer than the video running time. The picture is just black during this final audio part.

Big thanks to the posters of the 1080p/5.1 encodes of the episodes, the subs and the chapters.
